channel.title: Mods in Left 4 Dead 1 and 2
channel.description: Left 4 Dead 1 and 2 are fun games, but when mods come and kill the fun of versus, things get annoying. It's really annoying to have about 8 survivors on the other team and 2 people on your team. It makes it impossible, and it's annoying and unfair how people can actually release a smoker's tongue, ignore a boomers bile, and have infinite throwing objects. What are your thoughts on mods in Left 4 Dead 1 and 2?

item.title: Mods in Left 4 Dead 1 and 2
item.dc:creator: wheybags
item.description:
Yeah man, just don’t play on bad servers.

EDIT: Oh wait it’s soaringscout.

Read full topic
